title: Buttery chicken curry
ingredients: ['150g butter', '4 to 5 onions, grated', '5 cloves garlic, grated', '1 (2.5cm) piece root ginger, grated', '1 tsp chilli powder', '1 tsp ground coriander', '1 tsp ground cumin', 'salt to taste', '2 large tomatoes, chopped', '250g natural yoghurt', '1 whole chicken, cut into pieces and skin removed', '1/2 tsp garam masala']
